Mobile Phones With 6 GB & Above RAM

This list contains 3210 Mobile Phones With 6 GB & Above RAM in India. This price list was last updated on Apr 07, 2024.

Top 3 Mobile Phones With 6 GB & Above RAM are as follows:
  1. OnePlus Nord CE 4 5G: Memory Card (Hybrid), Wi-Fi, 128 GB inbuilt, Android v14, 6.7 inches
  2. Motorola Edge 50 Pro 5G: Dual Sim, Vo5G, 8 GB RAM, VoLTE, 6.7 inches
  3. OnePlus Nord 4 5G: 50 MP + 13 MP + 5 MP Triple Rear & 32 MP Front Camera, 8 GB RAM, 5G, Wi-Fi, Snapdragon 7+ Gen3
